title: Papyrus Fragments Inscribed with Text Written in Pahlavi
description: Papyrus inscribed on both sides in very massive black. Three fragments with text in Pahlavi. The largest fragment has 13 lines of text. The larger of the two small fragments has 3 lines of text on one side, and 2 on the other. The smallest fragment has 2 lines of text.
dimensions:
Glass: 10 13/16 x 15 9/16 in. (27.5 x 39.5 cm)
Largest Fragment: 11 13/16 x 12 5/16 in. (30 x 31.3 cm)

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
